# 1. 언제 0이 될까?
## code:
```python
while a.__gt__(0):
    a /= 10
    n+=1
    print(a)
```
## result:
```python
0.1
0.01
0.001
0.0001
1e-05
1.0000000000000002e-06
1.0000000000000002e-07
1.0000000000000002e-08
1.0000000000000003e-09
1.0000000000000003e-10
1.0000000000000003e-11
1.0000000000000002e-12
...
1e-312
1e-313
1e-314
1e-315
1e-316
9.999997e-318
1e-318
1e-319
1e-320
1e-321
1e-322
1e-323
0.0
1e-323.__eq__(0)
False
1e-323.__eq__(0.0)
False

1e-324.__eq__(0)
True
1e-324.__eq__(0.0)
True
```

# 2. 언제 1이 될까?
## code:
```python
b = 0.9
n = 1
while b.__lt__(1):
    print(b)
    b += 0.9/(10**n)
    n += 1
    if b.__eq__(1):
        print(n,'번째에서 종료')
```
## result:
```python     
0.9
0.99
0.999
0.9999
0.99999
0.9999990000000001
0.9999999
0.9999999900000001
0.999999999
0.9999999999
0.99999999999
0.999999999999
0.9999999999999
0.99999999999999
0.999999999999999
0.9999999999999999
17 번째에서 종료
b == 1
True
0.99999999999999999 == 1
True
0.9999999999999999 == 1
False
```
